data.quote: When a person starts to talk about their dreams, it's as if something bubbles up from within. Their eyes brighten, their face glows, and you can feel the excitement in their words.

data.quote: Our life is composed greatly from dreams, from the unconscious, and they must be brought into connection with action. They must be woven together.
data.author: Anais Nin

data.quote: Everyone loves a comeback story, and everyone loves the underdog as well. I kind of feel like I've been the underdog. Hopefully that inspires people to not give up on themselves and their lives and not give up on their dreams.
data.author: James Arthur

data.quote: Never in my wildest dreams did I entertain the idea that I would become a fashion designer.
data.author: Giorgio Armani

data.quote: I feel like, big city or small town, you can relate to following your parents' footsteps or putting your own dreams on the back burner or vices that we get caught up in - that whole cycle. That's not just a small-town thing. That's a life thing.
data.author: Kacey Musgraves

data.quote: When the legends die, the dreams end; there is no more greatness.
data.author: Tecumseh

data.quote: I want to show everyone that if you pursue your dreams, they can come true no matter what. That's what I want to do.
data.author: Martin Garrix

data.quote: I want to create an economy where minimum wage is a very brief stepping stone to higher-paying jobs so people can realize their dreams.
data.author: Thom Tillis

data.quote: The world of men is dreaming, it has gone mad in its sleep, and a snake is strangling it, but it can't wake up.
data.author: D. H. Lawrence

data.quote: Divorce is a time of change. It really rocks a foundation of most people's lives. When we have our heart broken or our dreams taken away from us, it is a time of growth and change.
data.author: Debbie Ford

data.quote: It's when children are 15, 16 or 17 that they decide whether they want to be a doctor, an engineer, a politician or go to the Mars or moon. That is the time they start having a dream, and that's the time you can work on them. You can help them shape their dreams.
data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: It is better to risk starving to death then surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left?
data.author: Jim Carrey

data.quote: They thought I was a Surrealist, but I wasn't. I never painted dreams. I painted my own reality.
data.author: Frida Kahlo

data.quote: The world is full of people who have dreams of playing at Carnegie Hall, of running a marathon, and of owning their own business. The difference between the people who make it across the finish line and everyone else is one simple thing: an action plan.
data.author: John Tesh

data.quote: The dreams and passions stored within hearts are powerful keys which can unlock a wealth of potential.
data.author: John C. Maxwell

data.quote: People ask how can a Jewish kid from the Bronx do preppy clothes? Does it have to do with class and money? It has to do with dreams.
data.author: Ralph Lauren

data.author: Donald Trump

data.quote: I think that they way my parents raised me, they taught me to always follow my dreams and never give up, no matter what the obstacle.
data.author: Katie Stevens

data.quote: Never think you can't do something. I definitely never thought I could write a book, and even after I started writing it, I was like, 'Oh my God, how am I gonna write a book?' Just set your sights high and reach for the stars. Go live your dreams, and never think you can't.
data.author: Connor Franta

data.quote: I believe dreams represent the purest form of fantasy we unleash through our subconscious. They represent the truest freedom we can experience. Totally unrepressed and totally creative.
data.author: Miguel

data.quote: In my long life I have found peace, joy, and happiness beyond my fondest hopes and dreams. One of the supreme benedictions of my life has been my marriage to an elect daughter of God. I love her with all my heart and soul.
data.author: James E. Faust

data.quote: We all have so much more power to make our dreams a reality - and love life along the way - than we think we do!
data.author: Rachele Brooke Smith

data.quote: Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
data.author: William Butler Yeats

data.quote: We must stop talking about the American dream and start listening to the dreams of Americans.
data.author: Max Beerbohm

data.quote: You have to keep going and pursue your dreams.

data.quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.
data.author: Douglas Adams

data.quote: I prefer to be a dreamer among the humblest, with visions to be realized, than lord among those without dreams and desires.
data.author: Khalil Gibran

data.quote: Vision gets the dreams started. Dreaming employs your God-given imagination to reinforce the vision. Both are part of something I believe is absolutely necessary to building the life of a champion, a winner, a person of high character who is consistently at the top of whatever game he or she is in.
data.author: Emmitt Smith

data.quote: I have mixed feelings about how fast things are changing as a result of technology. There's no denying that through technology there are amazing things being created that help people with diseases or help people's dreams come true. But there's also this obsession. Social media is the most dangerous of them all.
data.author: Amanda Crew

data.quote: To be given the opportunity to help shape new artists' careers and mentor them to see their dreams come to fruition is a task I welcome with open arms.
data.author: Christina Aguilera

data.quote: There are many talented people who haven't fulfilled their dreams because they over thought it, or they were too cautious, and were unwilling to make the leap of faith.
data.author: James Cameron

data.quote: Dreams grow if you grow.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.
data.author: Billy Wilder

data.quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.

data.quote: I have had dreams and I have had nightmares, but I have conquered my nightmares because of my dreams.

data.author: Jimmy Webb

data.quote: You have all the reason in the world to achieve your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization.
data.author: Denis Waitley

data.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

data.quote: Let us keep the dance of rain our fathers kept and tread our dreams beneath the jungle sky.
data.author: Arna Bontemps

data.quote: I know it's cliche to say, 'When you do something you love you never work a day in your life.' But it is true: When you do something you love, life gets to be a little bit easier and enjoyable. So I just want people to follow their dreams.

data.quote: You know, one of my biggest dreams in life is to play a Disney princess.
data.author: Ginnifer Goodwin

data.quote: I'm not really that girl who dreams about her wedding day.

data.quote: Believe it or not, lots of people change their majors and abandon their dreams just to avoid a couple of math classes in college.

data.author: Apolo Ohno

data.quote: When I am president, I will work to ensure that all of our kids are treated equally and protected equally. Every action I take, I will ask myself, 'Does this make life better for young Americans in Baltimore, Chicago, Detroit, Ferguson, who have as much of a right to live out their dreams as any other child America?'
data.author: Donald Trump

data.quote: The first 'D' is to dream: dream big - not for yourself, but for the country and for the world. The second 'D' is to discover: discover your full potential and the opportunities that surround you; and the third 'D' is to do. 'Do' means to act on your dreams and make best use of the opportunities you have discovered.
data.author: Kailash Satyarthi

data.quote: My dreams were all my own I accounted for them to nobody they were my refuge when annoyed - my dearest pleasure when free.
data.author: Mary Shelley

data.quote: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
data.author: George Bernard Shaw

data.quote: Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.
data.author: Eugene Ionesco

data.quote: I felt like an ugly duckling back in school. I was a complete tomboy with short hair. Never in my dreams did I imagine that I would walk the ramp with 6-inch heels. My friends can't believe that I'm an actor, because I was such an introvert in school.

data.quote: I feel like I'm making a difference. I feel like putting out a message for young girls to follow your dreams and just work at what you want to do and be yourself.
data.author: Willow Smith

data.quote: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?

data.quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.
data.author: Eva Green

data.quote: The starting point of discovering who you are, your gifts, your talents, your dreams, is being comfortable with yourself. Spend time alone. Write in a journal. Take long walks in the woods.
data.author: Robin S. Sharma

data.author: Dexter Gordon

data.quote: I mean, every child at one stage dreams of being a prince or a princess.
data.author: Mary, Crown Princess of Denmark

data.quote: We must look for ways to be an active force in our own lives. We must take charge of our own destinies, design a life of substance and truly begin to live our dreams.

data.quote: She still talks to me now, only now she talks to me in my dreams. And I can't wait to go to sleep tonight because we have a lot to talk about. I love you.

data.quote: Today I know that there is still work to be done, but along the way my I am achieving my dreams.
data.author: Candace Parker

data.quote: High achievers spot rich opportunities swiftly, make big decisions quickly and move into action immediately. Follow these principles and you can make your dreams come true.
data.author: Robert H. Schuller

data.quote: The dreams which reveal the supernatural are promises and messages that God sends us directly: they are nothing but His angels, His ministering spirits, who usually appear to us when we are in a great predicament.
data.author: Paracelsus

data.quote: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket.
data.author: Emil Zatopek

data.quote: It is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
data.author: Virginia Woolf

data.quote: I couldn't help but to think back to my classmates at Thomas Jefferson High School in San Antonio. The difference was opportunity.
data.author: Julian Castro

data.quote: I want people to follow their dreams, yes... but I'm not interested in telling young black kids how to be rappers... I want to show them that there's so many other paths you can take, besides a rapper or basketball player.

data.quote: You have to keep pushing toward those dreams no matter what setbacks happen.
data.author: Anthony Hamilton

data.quote: I just write what I wanted to write. I write what amuses me. It's totally for myself. I never in my wildest dreams expected this popularity.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: There are millions of Americans outside Washington who are tired of stale political arguments and are moving this country forward. They believe, and I believe, that here in America, our success should depend not on accident of birth, but the strength of our work ethic and the scope of our dreams.
data.author: Barack Obama

data.quote: Romantic comedies seem to take over where the fairytales of childhood left off, feeding our dreams of a soulmate; though, sadly, the Hollywood endings prove quite elusive in the real world.
data.author: Mariella Frostrup

data.quote: Saddle your dreams before you ride em.
data.author: Mary Webb

data.quote: Sometimes, the only realists are the dreamers.
data.author: Paul Wellstone

data.quote: I paint what cannot be photographed, that which comes from the imagination or from dreams, or from an unconscious drive.
data.author: Man Ray

data.quote: My life turned out to be beyond my greatest dreams.
data.author: Anthony Hopkins

data.quote: Dreams do come true. If anyone's proof of that, it's me.
data.author: Jennifer Hudson

data.quote: I suppose all fictional characters, especially in adventure or heroic fiction, at the end of the day are our dreams about ourselves. And sometimes they can be really revealing.
data.author: Alan Moore

data.quote: One of the dreams on my wish list is to spend more time in Thailand.
data.author: Kevin Kwan

data.quote: In bed my real love has always been the sleep that rescued me by allowing me to dream.
data.author: Luigi Pirandello

data.quote: Ever since I was a kid, I wanted to be a marine biologist. As you go through the grind and the distraction of a career, it's easy to lose sight of your dreams.

data.quote: I'm a big believer in living out your dreams and facing your fears.
data.author: Brock Lesnar

data.quote: Men are the dreams of a shadow.
data.author: Pindar

data.quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.
data.author: Paul Bryant

data.quote: Working together in concert more smoothly not only helps us move more quickly; it changes the nature of what we can undertake. When we have the confidence that we can orchestrate the group effort required to realize them, we dare bigger dreams.

data.quote: Short stories are tiny windows into other worlds and other minds and dreams. They are journeys you can make to the far side of the universe and still be back in time for dinner.
data.author: Neil Gaiman

data.quote: What is a television apparatus to man, who has only to shut his eyes to see the most inaccessible regions of the seen and the never seen, who has only to imagine in order to pierce through walls and cause all the planetary Baghdads of his dreams to rise from the dust.
data.author: Salvador Dali

data.quote: Of all our dreams today there is none more important - or so hard to realise - than that of peace in the world. May we never lose our faith in it or our resolve to do everything that can be done to convert it one day into reality.
data.author: Lester B. Pearson

data.quote: You can do anything if you set your mind to it. Look out for kids, help them dream and be inspired. We teach calculus in schools, but I believe the most important formula is courage plus dreams equals success.

data.quote: Talking about dreams is like talking about movies, since the cinema uses the language of dreams; years can pass in a second, and you can hop from one place to another. It's a language made of image. And in the real cinema, every object and every light means something, as in a dream.

data.quote: Today, among little girls especially, princesses and the romanticised ideal they represent - finding the man of your dreams - have a limited shelf life.

data.quote: I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough.

data.quote: No matter where you are from, no matter what your background is, no matter what your socioeconomic status is, every person can achieve his or her dreams.

data.quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
data.author: Anais Nin

data.quote: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way.
data.author: Baltasar Gracian

data.quote: We all dream; we do not understand our dreams, yet we act as if nothing strange goes on in our sleep minds, strange at least by comparison with the logical, purposeful doings of our minds when we are awake.

data.quote: All men of action are dreamers.
data.author: James Huneker

data.quote: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.

data.quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
data.author: John Barrymore

data.quote: Where all is but dream, reasoning and arguments are of no use, truth and knowledge nothing.
data.author: John Locke

data.quote: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.
data.author: Joseph Conrad

data.quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.
data.author: Walter Scott

data.quote: Oh, I was never a businessman. I was a visionary, a dreamer.
data.author: Jim Bakker

data.quote: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision that is characterized by the willingness to work hard, a desire for excellence, and a belief in our right and our responsiblity to be equal members of society.

data.quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: Only things the dreamers make live on. They are the eternal conquerors.
data.author: Herbert Kaufman

data.quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
data.author: Stefano Gabbana

data.quote: When we are motivated by goals that have deep meaning, by dreams that need completion, by pure love that needs expressing, then we truly live.
data.author: Greg Anderson

data.quote: Like my mother, I was always saying, 'I'll fix my life one day.' It became clear when I saw her die without fulfilling her dreams that my time was now or maybe never.

data.quote: I would like to see anyone be able to achieve their dreams, and that's what this organization does.
data.author: Sergey Brin

data.quote: Dare to visualize a world in which your most treasured dreams have become true.
data.author: Ralph Marston

data.quote: Count the dreams of your mind; if the numbers of the dreams exceeds the number of achievements, you are young.
data.author: Shimon Peres

data.quote: I want my boys to have an understanding of people's emotions, their insecurities, people's distress, and their hopes and dreams.
data.author: Princess Diana

data.quote: Don't let your dreams be dreams.
data.author: Jack Johnson

data.quote: I had to overcome challenge after challenge in order to take my life from nothing to living my dreams.
data.author: Curtis Jackson

data.quote: People's dreams are made out of what they do all day. The same way a dog that runs after rabbits will dream of rabbits. It's what you do that makes your soul, not the other way around.
data.author: Barbara Kingsolver

data.quote: Your mind, while blessed with permanent memory, is cursed with lousy recall. Written goals provide clarity. By documenting your dreams, you must think about the process of achieving them.

data.quote: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable.
data.author: Christopher Reeve

data.quote: Here's what I see all across this great city - people working together to make Boston a better place to live and to raise children, to grow and pursue dreams.
data.author: Thomas Menino

data.quote: Youth is in a grand flush, like the hot days of ending summer; and pleasant dreams thrall your spirit, like the smoky atmosphere that bathes the landscape of an August day.

data.quote: Dreams don't have deadlines. I'm thinking of doing bigger and better things and having more fun with it.

data.quote: Dreams become reality when we put our minds to it.
data.author: Queen Latifah

data.quote: Real shapes and real patterns are things you would observe in nature, like the marks on the back of a cobra's hood or the markings on a fish or a lizard. Imaginary shapes are just that, symbols that come to a person in dreams or reveries and are charged with meaning.
data.author: Jim Woodring

data.quote: My fear is that I go up to the girl of my dreams and say 'I'm sorry, but I've got to say hello to you,' and she slides the stool back and gets up and walks away, saying, 'Not for me, Bub. I don't want anything to do with you.'

data.author: Bo Burnham

data.quote: Keep God first, chase your dreams, and everything will pay off.
data.author: Jacob Latimore

data.quote: Stories come to me in mysterious ways, more like dreams than reasoned creations.
data.author: Anthony Browne

data.quote: Dreams are the guiding words of the soul. Why should I henceforth not love my dreams and not make their riddling images into objects of my daily consideration?
data.author: Carl Jung

data.quote: Dreams are illustrations from the book your soul is writing about you.
data.author: Marsha Norman

data.quote: The world is seldom what it seems; to man, who dimly sees, realities appear as dreams, and dreams realities.
data.author: Samuel Johnson

data.quote: In our dreams we are always young.
data.author: Sarah Louise Delany

data.quote: We've removed the ceiling above our dreams. There are no more impossible dreams.
data.author: Jesse Jackson

data.quote: Intellectual despair results in neither weakness nor dreams, but in violence. It is only a matter of knowing how to give vent to one's rage; whether one only wants to wander like madmen around prisons, or whether one wants to overturn them.
data.author: Georges Bataille

data.quote: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.
data.author: Leonard Cohen

data.quote: The dialogue between client and architect is about as intimate as any conversation you can have, because when you're talking about building a house, you're talking about dreams.
data.author: Robert A. M. Stern

data.quote: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
data.author: James M. Barrie

data.quote: When a child, my dreams rode on your wishes, I was your son, high on your horse, My mind a top whipped by the lashes Of your rhetoric, windy of course.
data.author: Stephen Spender

data.quote: We need affordable space travel to inspire our youth, to let them know that they can experience their dreams, can set significant goals and be in a position to lead all of us to future progress in exploration, discovery and fun. Thanks to the X Prize for the inspiration.
data.author: Burt Rutan

data.quote: Love is the most terrible, and also the most generous of the passions; it is the only one which includes in its dreams the happiness of someone else.
data.author: Alphonse Karr

data.quote: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Technology has a great advantage in that we are capable of creating dinosaurs and show them on the screen even though they are extinct 65 million years. All of a sudden, we have a fantastic tool that is as good as dreams are.
data.author: Werner Herzog

data.quote: Never let your dreams go away.
data.author: Mike Piazza

data.quote: My heroes, my dreams, and my future lay in Yankee Stadium. And they can't take that away from me.
data.author: Derek Jeter

data.quote: The percentage you're paying is too high priced While you're living beyond all your means And the man in the suit has just bought a new car From the profit he's made on your dreams.
data.author: Steve Winwood

data.quote: But we can hold our spirits and our bodies so pure and high, we may cherish such thoughts and such ideals, and dream such dreams of lofty purpose, that we can determine and know what manner of men we will be, whenever and wherever the hour strikes and calls to noble action.
data.author: Joshua Chamberlain

data.quote: Field of Dreams is probably our generation's It's A Wonderful Life.
data.author: Kevin Costner

data.quote: Man is firmly convinced that he is awake in reality he is caught in a net of sleep and dreams which he has unconsciously woven himself.
data.author: Gustave Meyrink

data.quote: Only in dreams, in poetry, in play do we sometimes arrive at what we were before we were this thing that, who knows, we are.
data.author: Julio Cortazar

data.quote: People who insist on telling their dreams are among the terrors of the breakfast table.
data.author: Max Beerbohm

data.quote: The curse of the romantic is a greed for dreams, an intensity of expectation that, in the end, diminishes the reality.
data.author: Marya Mannes

data.quote: Our dreams are made of real things, like a shoebox full of photographs.
data.author: Jack Johnson

data.quote: Seems like God don't see fit to give the black man nothing but dreams - but He did give us children to make them dreams seem worthwhile.
data.author: Lorraine Hansberry

data.quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Our life dreams the Utopia. Our death achieves the Ideal.
data.author: Victor Hugo

data.quote: When you stop having dreams and ideals - well, you might as well stop altogether.
data.author: Marian Anderson

data.quote: You'll be much more successful if you follow your dreams and follow your passions.
data.author: Jay Weatherill

data.quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
data.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

data.quote: It has been my observation that parents kill more dreams than anybody.
data.author: Spike Lee

data.quote: When I look back over my life it's almost as if there was a plan laid out for me - from the little girl who was so passionate about animals who longed to go to Africa and whose family couldn't afford to put her through college. Everyone laughed at my dreams. I was supposed to be a secretary in Bournemouth.
data.author: Jane Goodall

data.quote: Believe in and follow your dreams.
data.author: Kristanna Loken

data.quote: I don't understand people who dream in black and white. I just don't get it. My dreams have always been vivid color.
data.author: Gary Ross

data.quote: The motivation is in my heart to work toward my goals and my dreams.
data.author: Nonito Donaire

data.quote: Like the phoenix, socialism is reborn from every pile of ashes left day in, day out, by burnt-out human dreams and charred hopes.
data.author: Zygmunt Bauman

data.quote: Follow your intuition, listening to your dreams, your inner voice to guide you.
data.author: Katori Hall

data.quote: As I and the rest of my Pittsburgh Steelers teammates prepared that week in late December 1974, we knew one thing: The road to the Super Bowl in the AFC went through Oakland. To achieve your dreams as a team, you had to slay the Oakland Raiders. They were the barometer of what it took to be a championship team.
data.author: Joe Greene

data.quote: A visionary is someone who can see the future, or thinks he sees the future. In my case, I use it and it comes out right. That doesn't come from daydreams or dreams, but it comes from knowing the market and knowing the world and knowing people really well and knowing where they're going to be tomorrow.
data.author: Leonard Lauder

data.quote: Thankfully, dreams can change. If we'd all stuck with our first dream, the world would be overrun with cowboys and princesses.
data.author: Stephen Colbert

data.quote: Those of us who submitted or surrendered our ideas and dreams and identities to the 'leaders' must take back our rights, our identities, our responsibilities.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: I'm not more than a musician that enjoys what he does and a Colombian that dreams and fights for peace in his country.
data.author: Juanes

data.quote: I have crazy claustrophobic dreams, weird elevator dreams where the elevator closes in and all of a sudden I am lying down - oh my God, it's a casket. Just freaky stuff like that.
data.author: Dave Grohl

data.quote: I wanted to be a soccer player, and I became the best of the best, the number one, better than Maradona, better than Pele, and even better than Messi - but only at night, nighttime, during my dreams. When I wake up, I realized that I have wooden legs and that I'm doomed to be a writer.

data.quote: I believe people have to follow their dreams - I did.
data.author: Larry Ellison

data.quote: A strong mentor can help a young woman find and advance in the career of her dreams that otherwise may have seemed impossible.
data.author: Kirsten Gillibrand

data.quote: I wanted to be a musician, either a guitarist or a drummer. I guess my dreams were in the entertainment industry, and I landed somewhere along there.
data.author: Israel Broussard

data.quote: Sometimes just being on a beach with my loved ones is all the adventure I need. I am a happy camper and continue to be a citizen of the world. I have yet to discover other cultures, other peoples' dreams and treasures. I will always be a traveler who is discovering beautiful Gaia.
data.author: Guy Laliberte

data.quote: Every human heart cries and yearns for the same thing: a chance to fulfill his or her own dreams and desires. Even the poorest man has a dream.
data.author: Myles Munroe

data.quote: I had rock-star dreams from 8 or 9 almost nonstop. I thought it was going to be like being a god on earth: having as many women as you want whenever you want them, having super powers, being incredibly wealthy, never doing laundry.
data.author: Rivers Cuomo

data.quote: I think it is often easier to make progress on mega-ambitious dreams. Since no one else is crazy enough to do it, you have little competition. In fact, there are so few people this crazy that I feel like I know them all by first name.
data.author: Larry Page

data.quote: 'Titanic' made me want to tell stories... To have all these characters and costumes and have ambition and think big and have dreams... It came at a very troubled period of my life.
data.author: Xavier Dolan

data.quote: The day you decide to pursue your dreams, don't forget that this is a game you don't enter to compete, but to win. This is a game between two that you have to win for the people who came to watch you be triumphant.
data.author: Fabrizio Moreira

data.quote: We will bring back our jobs. We will bring back our borders. We will bring back our wealth. And we will bring back our dreams.
data.author: Donald Trump

data.quote: We are in a world where globalization, which is an ideology, has forgotten and put aside the people, the people's interests, aspirations, and dreams.
data.author: Marine Le Pen

data.author: Peter McWilliams

data.quote: A dream is a scripture, and many scriptures are nothing but dreams.
data.author: Umberto Eco

data.quote: In the books I have written, I have created in my mind a universe. My kids say I have a village in my head and I live in that village, and it's true. data.quote: The work of an advertising agency is warmly and immediately human. It deals with human needs, wants, dreams and hopes. Its 'product' cannot be turned out on an assembly line.
data.author: Leo Burnett

data.quote: Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
data.author: Virginia Woolf

data.quote: Sports nurtures dreams of achieving self confidence and masculine striving for the skinny kid watching a boxer dance around the ring with sublime ease.
data.author: Armstrong Williams

data.quote: But I have been interested in dreams, really since I was a kid. I have always been fascinated by the idea that your mind, when you are asleep, can create a world in a dream and you are perceiving it as though it really existed.
data.author: Christopher Nolan

data.quote: My first book was called 'Buried Dreams,' about a serial-killer, which was probably about ten years ahead of the serial-killer curve. It was a national bestseller, but it was three years of living in the sewer of this guy's mind.

data.quote: My theory is that literature is essential to society in the way that dreams are essential to our lives. We can't live without dreaming - as we can't live without sleep. data.quote: Even in the hardest circumstances, dreams can give you the courage to live, and I hope I can share that message with children in need.

data.quote: Women have to summon up courage to fulfill dormant dreams.

data.quote: Pop culture shapes our ideas of what is normal and what our dreams can be and what our roles are. Politics, of course, decides how the power and the money in the country is distributed. Both are equally important, and each affects the other.
data.author: Gloria Steinem

data.quote: The bipolar world of the Cold War is history. The new world order, however, is not the One World dreamed of by Wilsonian idealists. It is a Balkanizing world where race, tribe, culture and creed matter most, and democracy is seen not as an end in itself but as a means to an end - the accretion of power by one's own kind to achieve one's own dreams.
data.author: Pat Buchanan

data.quote: In my perfect day, I wake up next to the woman of my dreams, and she's crying tears of joy because she's so excited about the life we have together. I'm preparing to compete in the 2016 Olympics with U.S.A. Team Handball, so I head to an intense training session with my coach to increase my physical strength and athleticism.
data.author: Lewis Howes

data.quote: When Paul Allen and I started Microsoft over 30 years ago, we had big dreams about software. We had dreams about the impact it could have.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: I just kind of wake up with a new idea and new dreams every day, and I follow that dream, as they say.

data.quote: I came to the United States in the early '80s and was welcomed with open arms and given the opportunity to pursue my dreams. God has been very kind to us. data.author: Naveen Jain

data.quote: When we started Aftermath, we had something like 20 artists, and it was driving me crazy. I couldn't sit down and focus on any of it. Plus, it was doubly hard because you ended up crushing these people's dreams when you had to let them go.

data.quote: I have dreams that I will reach balance in my life, and, at forty-one, I have none.

data.quote: Progressives believe in making progress, which is why I'm proud to endorse Hillary Clinton, who I know will continue fighting to ensure our children and grandchildren can achieve their highest and best dreams.
data.author: Thomas Perez

data.quote: Tell me about yourself - your struggles, your dreams, your telephone number.
data.author: Peter Arno

data.quote: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.
data.author: Dave Matthews

data.quote: If you're the type of person who has to fulfill your dreams, you've gotta be resourceful to make sure you can do it. I came out to California when I was 21, thinking my New York credentials would take me all the way. I came back home a year later all dejected and a failure.
data.author: Vin Diesel
data.category: Failure, Home, You Can Do It

data.quote: I motivate others by making sure that they understand to go after their dreams and don't let anyone tell you you can't. If you are motivated enough and put the work in that you can achieve anything in life that you set your mind to.
data.author: Magic Johnson

data.quote: I think there are a number of things that you can do to encourage your kids' dreams, but I do believe in speaking by experience of having a lot of help along the way, stumbling in the past. We've all stumbled, and we certainly all deserve to get up and walk again.

data.quote: If you can't read, it's going to be hard to realize dreams.
data.author: Booker T. Washington

data.quote: Lonesome. Lonesome. I know what it means. Here all by my lonesome, dreaming empty dreams. Weary. Weary at the close of day, wondering if tomorrow brings me joy or sorrow.

data.quote: Those who have compared our life to a dream were right... we were sleeping wake, and waking sleep.

data.quote: Dreams sometimes foretell the future.
data.author: Mickey Hart

data.quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

data.quote: I stayed true to my dreams and, eventually, they came true.
data.author: Kevin Hart

data.quote: I do not know whether I was then a man dreaming I was a butterfly, or whether I am now a butterfly dreaming I am a man.
data.author: Zhuangzi

data.quote: Dream lofty dreams, and as you dream, so you shall become. Your vision is the promise of what you shall one day be; your ideal is the prophecy of what you shall at last unveil.

data.quote: I have been interested in dreams, really since I was a kid. I have always been fascinated by the idea that your mind, when you are asleep, can create a world in a dream and you are perceiving it as though it really existed.
data.author: Christopher Nolan

data.quote: A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.

data.author: Rene Descartes

data.quote: Like dreams, statistics are a form of wish fulfillment.
data.author: Jean Baudrillard

data.quote: I want that longevity in the career, so if you don't know how to get it, you trying to chase that high, you trying to continue to chase your dreams and conquer things you never thought you could get. data.author: Future

data.quote: Capitalism is always evaluated against dreams. Utopia is a dream. It doesn't exist.
data.author: Rush Limbaugh

data.quote: The real hero is always a hero by mistake he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.
data.author: Umberto Eco

data.quote: Living in dreams of yesterday, we find ourselves still dreaming of impossible future conquests.

data.quote: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.

data.quote: Reality seems valueless by comparison with the dreams of fevered imaginations reality is therefore abandoned.
data.author: Emile Durkheim

data.quote: You don't know when you are immersed in a book what the reaction to it will be, but I feel great about 'The Lake of Dreams.'

data.quote: I always make my dreams into goals.

data.quote: Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge.

data.quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our character.

data.quote: You know, the man of my dreams might walk round the corner tomorrow. I'm older and wiser and I think I'd make a great girlfriend. I live in the realm of romantic possibility.

data.quote: I've got big, big dreams for the future.

data.quote: I have had a dream indicating rather clearly that I am on the way to being hetero, though I don't accept it with much enthusiasm either awake or in the dreams.

data.quote: I am against nature. I don't dig nature at all. I think nature is very unnatural. I think the truly natural things are dreams, which nature can't touch with decay.

data.quote: I dream that someday the step between my mind and my finger will no longer be needed. And that simply by blinking my eyes, I shall make pictures. Then, I think, I shall really have become a photographer.

data.quote: I've always said that one night, I'm going to find myself in some field somewhere, I'm standing on grass, and it's raining, and I'm with the person I love, and I know I'm at the very point I've been dreaming of getting to.

data.quote: You know, Willie Wonka said it best: we are the makers of dreams, the dreamers of dreams.

data.author: Zora Neale Hurston

data.quote: You can plant a dream.

data.quote: Do It Under the Influence Yourself! That's what we're shooting for! Get drunk and make your dreams come true.

data.quote: I've been interested in dreams since I as a kid and I've wanted to do a film about them for a long time.

data.quote: Barack Obama knows that to create an economy built to last, we need to focus on middle-class families. Families who aren't sure what Monday morning will bring, but who believe our nation's best days are still ahead.

data.quote: When we see the face of a child, we think of the future. We think of their dreams about what they might become, and what they might accomplish.

data.author: Jourdan Dunn

data.quote: If you're following your dreams, you're doing something you love and that you believe in yourself for.

data.quote: To be a human being is to be in a state of tension between your appetites and your dreams, and the social realities around you and your obligations to your fellow man.

data.quote: There's a lot of people that have great ideas and dreams and whatnot, but unless you're willing to work really, really hard, and work for what you want, it's never going to happen.

data.quote: If you ask me, there's nothing more incredible than a woman who's in charge of her own destiny - and working daily to make her dreams a reality.

data.quote: God's gifts put man's best dreams to shame.
data.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

data.quote: The dreamer can know no truth, not even about his dream, except by awaking out of it.
data.author: George Santayana

data.quote: No one should negotiate their dreams. Dreams must be free to fly high. No government, no legislature, has a right to limit your dreams. You should never agree to surrender your dreams.

data.quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
data.author: Malcolm Forbes

data.quote: Only the dreamer shall understand realities, though in truth his dreaming must be not out of proportion to his waking.
data.author: Margaret Fuller

data.quote: You gotta have a dream. If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?
data.author: Oscar Hammerstein II

data.quote: I challenge you to be dreamers I challenge you to be doers and let us make the greatest place in the world even better.

data.quote: Dreams must be heeded and accepted. For a great many of them come true.
data.author: Paracelsus

data.author: Jane Roberts

data.quote: I've said it before, but it's absolutely true: My mother gave me my drive, but my father gave me my dreams. Thanks to him, I could see a future.

data.quote: I was so lucky to have parents who supported me, 100%, with whatever I was doing, both financially and emotionally. Having that they made my life so much easier. data.quote: My parent's divorce and hard times at school, all those things combined to mold me, to make me grow up quicker. And it gave me the drive to pursue my dreams that I wouldn't necessarily have had otherwise.
data.author: Christina Aguilera

data.quote: People are never more insecure than when they become obsessed with their fears at the expense of their dreams.
data.author: Norman Cousins

data.quote: Hollywood has always been a cage... a cage to catch our dreams.
data.author: John Huston

data.quote: Learn from your dreams what you lack.
data.author: W. H. Auden

data.quote: Dreams get you into the future and add excitement to the present.
data.author: Robert Conklin

data.quote: O reason, reason, abstract phantom of the waking state, I had already expelled you from my dreams, now I have reached a point where those dreams are about to become fused with apparent realities: now there is only room here for myself.
data.author: Louis Aragon

data.quote: It's not my job to dream your dreams. It's my job to make your dreams become a reality.
data.author: Blanche Lincoln
